analysis.description:
GenesisProtocol.proposalsExpiredTimes (/unique_chucks/7/0x67b13f159ca093325554aac6ee104fce36f3f9dd.sol#3173-3174) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getBoostedProposalsCount (/unique_chucks/7/0x67b13f159ca093325554aac6ee104fce36f3f9dd.sol#3616-3625)
	- _execute (/unique_chucks/7/0x67b13f159ca093325554aac6ee104fce36f3f9dd.sol#3728-3812)
	- internalVote (/unique_chucks/7/0x67b13f159ca093325554aac6ee104fce36f3f9dd.sol#3865-3931)
ECRecovery.recover (/unique_chucks/7/0x67b13f159ca093325554aac6ee104fce36f3f9dd.sol#2717-2746) is declared view but contains assembly code

GenesisProtocol._isVotable (/unique_chucks/7/0x67b13f159ca093325554aac6ee104fce36f3f9dd.sol#3945-3947) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- ((pState == ProposalState.PreBoosted) || (pState == ProposalState.Boosted) || (pState == ProposalState.QuietEndingPeriod))
	- ((pState == ProposalState.PreBoosted) || (pState == ProposalState.Boosted) || (pState == ProposalState.QuietEndingPeriod))
	- ((pState == ProposalState.PreBoosted) || (pState == ProposalState.Boosted) || (pState == ProposalState.QuietEndingPeriod))
